name: Kiss: One Direction Edition
description:
You and your boyfriend are out at 1D's event! You decided to leave him and go find 1D on your own! But Hurry, your boyfriend and 1D's girl friends are around the corner!

THRILLING GAMEPLAY, ONE OF ITS KIND!
• 5 worlds: Harry, Zayn, Liam, Louis, Niall await you!
• Make AS MANY Kisses as possible before your boyfriend or their girlfriend STOPS you!
• Interest level decreases if you get caught or you guys don't kiss!
• Earn enough Kisses to complete each level and unlock unique statuses!

MAKE USE OF POWERUPS!
• Invisible – Go invisible, so they can't interrupt you and 1D!
• Fast Kiss – KISS FASTER, earn MORE KISSES!
• Slow Others – Allows more time to prevent others from STOPPING you!

FEATURES AND MORE
• Support full HD Graphics and all iOS devices
• Listen to their real voices
• Stylish, realistic One Direction members
